descriptionHtml:
Attack Pattern Information

ItemValue
Pattern IDXSS_DOM_004
NameinnerHTML DOM XSS
CategoryXSS
Subcategorydom_xss
SeverityHIGH

Attack Details

  • Payload: innerHTML='<img src=x onerror=alert("DOM")>'
  • Encoded: innerHTML%3D'%3Cimg%20src%3Dx%20onerror%3Dalert(%22DOM%22)%3E'
  • Expected Detection: Yes

Test Execution Results

  • Status: PASSED
  • Detection Count: 1 / 1
  • Latency: ~20000ms
  • Timestamp: 13:32:52.000 UTC

Detection Evidence
